0.1.name: wordpress/nextgen-gallery-custom-fields
0.1.description:
Please use version 1.0.2 for version of NGG LOWER than 1.7.x. Please use version 1.1.2 or greater for versions of NGG >= 1.7.x

This plugin was developed to add custom columns to the excellent and popular NextGEN Gallery plugin. Simply enter the name of your new field(s), select between "input", "textarea" or "dropdown", and the field(s) will be automatically added to the manage images form in the NGG admin panel. And as of version 0.4, you can now add custom fields to NextGEN galleries too!

QUESTIONS ASKED ON THE FORUM THAT ARE IN THE FAQ WILL NOT BE ANSWERED BY ME

I was recently in a motorcycle accident, and am not online too much anymore anyway. Feel free to donate via the link on the right to by me a beer and get me through this tough time :)
